title: 12/05: League Winners, Tough Matchups, Regulators and More (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
We ask if several key players can be "league winners" (5:25) for your Fantasy teams. These players include Lamar Miller, Jameis Winston, Rob Gronkowski and Spencer Ware ... Should you start or sit your studs in tough matchups (18:34) like Patrick Mahomes, Doug Baldwin, Chris Carson and Marlon Mack? We also address Kareem Hunt in Dynasty (20:55) and RBs to handcuff for the playoffs. Plus, Fantasy Regulators Part One (25:50) and a JAC-TEN preview (31:00) ... We've got some interesting ideas about Fantasy playoff scoring from our listeners (39:00), a lookahead to the WR position in 2019 (41:30), tweets about players (50:00) and Fantasy Regulators Part Two (54:50) ... Your emails at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: So you added a few RBs last night, now what do you do? We discuss that, preview TEN-JAC, do some regulating and look at the WR position in 2019.
